articles.author: John Cross
articles.title: Kalidou Koulibaly reveals John Terry hung up when he first called with Chelsea request - The Mirror
articles.description: Senegal captain Koulibaly joined Chelsea in a £34million switch from Italian side Napoli this summer, and has taken the No.26 shirt at Stamford Bridge, previously worn by club legend John Terry
articles.content:
John Terry hung up on Kalidou Koulibaly because he thought it was a prank call. 
 Koulibaly rang the Chelsea legend to ask for permission to take his No.26 shirt after completing his £34million move… [+2199 chars]
